content.query:
create VIEW gcpnested
AS
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://accsynapsestorage.dfs.core.windows.net/synapseroot/gcpnested/part-00000-tid-6950694702048029797-6db471ef-546b-4132-b7ed-55a3e8e0c980-193-1-c000.snappy.parquet',
        FORMAT='PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]

select * from dbo.gcpnested;

SELECT TOP (100) 
[sys_id],
[company],
[assigned_to],
JSON_VALUE(assigned_to, '$.display_value') as 'assigned_to',
JSON_VALUE(company, '$.display_value') as 'company name'
 FROM [dbo].[gcpnested]
 WHERE [company] is not null
 AND [assigned_to] is not null


SELECT TOP (100) 
[sys_id],
[company],
[assigned_to],
JSON_VALUE(assigned_to, '$.display_value') as 'assigned_to',
JSON_VALUE(company, '$.display_value') as 'company name'
 FROM [dbo].[gcpnested]
 WHERE [company] is not null
 AND [assigned_to] is not null

 select * from [dbo].[gcpnested]
